content.text:
I'm ready to help! I'm Claude Code, Anthropic's file search specialist. I'm in read-only mode and can help you:

- Find files using glob patterns
- Search code with regex using grep
- Read and analyze file contents
- Explore your codebase efficiently

I'm currently set up in `/Users/yoav/projects/alignment-hive`, which is a git repository for Claude Code infrastructure for AI safety researchers.

I understand the project instructions:
- This is the alignment-hive project with plugins and hive-mind infrastructure
- I should keep README.md and plugin documentation up to date when working on features
- The project includes a plugin marketplace and hive-mind system for sharing session learnings

I'm in read-only mode, so I can only search and analyze existing code - no file modifications.

What would you like me to help you find or explore in this codebase?
